name: Grubby 4
description:
Welcome to this FNAF inspired Grubby adventure!

play as the security guard of Grubhut, the new grubhub restauraunt,

They have some cool animatronic mascots, that are safe, right...

thanks to Jayyyi123 for helping with this project, and Scott Cawthon, for the FNAF 

series, which I took inspiration from,
